description: Run the Ruff formatter on the given files or directories

options.name: --check
options.description: Run in 'check' mode. Exits with 0 if formatted code is unmodified or formatting is disabled, 1 if formatted code is modified, and 123 if there was an error.

options.name: --diff
options.description: Avoid writing any formatted files to disk; instead, output a diff for each changed file to stdout.

options.name: --extension
options.description: The extension to use when formatting files over stdin

options.name: --target-version
options.description: The minimum Python version that should be supported.

options.name: --preview
options.description: Enable preview mode. Note that the formatter is still under development, and preview mode enables unstable formatting changes.

options.name: -h,--help
options.description: Print help

options.name: --no-cache
options.description: Disable cache reads.

options.name: --cache-dir
options.description: Path to the cache directory

options.name: --stdin-filename
options.description: The name of the file when passing it through stdin.

options.name: --exit-non-zero-on-format
options.description: Exit with a non-zero status code if any files were formatted.

options.name: --respect-gitignore
options.description: Respect gitignore files.

options.name: --exclude
options.description: List of paths, globs, or regular expressions to exclude.

options.name: --force-exclude
options.description: Like --exclude, but ignores all configuration and defaults.

options.name: --line-length
options.description: Set the line length.

options.name: --range
options.description: Format a specific range in the source file (e.g., 1:2-3:4).

options.name: -v,--verbose
options.description: Enable verbose logging.

options.name: -q,--quiet
options.description: Enable quiet mode.

options.name: -s,--silent
options.description: Enable silent mode.

options.name: --config
options.description: Path to the `pyproject.toml` or `ruff.toml` file to use for configuration

options.name: --isolated
options.description: Ignore all configuration files.

arguments.name: FILES
arguments.description: List of files or directories to format [default: .]
